Articles.Content: So I had my game keep crashing and after some part editing in the save file this happened. I was using firespitter which was causing the crashing and space plane plus with various other mods so I dont know what happened here
I mean I have worse things happen but usually removing parts goes without a hitch
You've opened up some kind of black hole inside Kerbin.

I guess some more back story is in order. * I don my monocle and top hat as I recline in my chair

So I was fly to the desert temple on kerbin and I am guessing that similarly to how the word walls in skyrim work, this temple contained the kraken and I annoyed it with my presence, sending the two kerbals inside to this hellish limbo thing
